title: Update Home greeting microcopy

requirements.text: Update the Home page welcome heading to replace the text “Welcome back” with “Welcome to your growth space”, while still displaying the user’s anonymous username in the greeting.

quotes: It's better if you could replace welcome back with welcome to your growth space

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx), the heading currently rendered as “Welcome back, {username}” is updated so the visible phrase “Welcome back” no longer appears.
The new heading includes the exact phrase “Welcome to your growth space” and still includes the user’s anonymous username (when available).
No other screens’ copy is changed as part of this request.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Fixing the build/deploy “Configuration error encountered” issue.
Reordering icons or changing navigation structure beyond the greeting text update.
